name.ja: クリティカル・サービス

requirement.en: When a monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Cyberse Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, you can send 1 Level 7 or 8 monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the Level of the monster sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 200.
